# type

**Instance Property**

The summary item’s type that indicates whether the amount is final.

## Declaration

```swift
var type: PKPaymentSummaryItemType { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property defaults to a [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentSummaryItemType/final] type. See [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentSummaryItemType] for other values.

## Describing summary items

- **label**: A short, localized description of the item.
- **amount**: The summary item’s amount.
- **PKPaymentSummaryItemType**: Constants that describe the type of the payment summary item, such as final or pending.
